Bringing high-quality educational apps to teachers in Title 1 schools and underserved communities.

Sign Up

If you’re an educator and would like more info, sign up here and we’ll keep you posted.

Learn More

Apps For Impact partners participating app makers with nonprofits to give free apps to teachers in Title 1 schools and underserved communities. We are committed to making high-quality educational apps and technology more accessible to a diverse range of kids.

Teachers also get resources and community support, for free, to help set them up for success with our educational tools.

Apps for Impact launches in Brooklyn, fall of 2015, and will grow nationally as we add partners. Contact hello@appsforimpact.co with questions or media inquires.
